column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////A friend and I had brunch and I was pleased with my choices. Since it was my first time visiting
column3: Jeffrey (forgive me if I didn't spell your name right) suggested a drink called
column4: "The Good Life". I like sweet drinks and this was PERFECT for me. When my friend joined me
column5: we ordered our meals (Shrimp and grits
column6: and Avocado toast) and it was DELICIOUS! The presentation was appetizing as well.
